page.title: 12PUBLIC ATTITUDES TO THE AREA
page.content: {View 1.}Marton is a residential area with a wide range of both old and modern properties.It is served by a variety of corner-shops and large supermarkets with more than a few public houses and working-men's clubs. The local bus services are very good giving a variety of routes into Blackpool town centre and South Shore. If any personal criticism is to be levied it is against the condition of the public roads and pavements.These are in a deteriorating condition,and the council is not particularly quick at repairing pot-holes etc.There is also inadequate parking facilities near to many of the retail establishmewnts especially those such as the local fish and chip shops.This is quite a problem during shop and trading hours as it prevents local people from parking their own cars
